title: Unchained Alistar
body: Could I get an unchained alistar + alistar? I havent found a link for it for oceania so i came here. I have subscribed to RiotGamesOCE

replies.body: Is this the free skin you get for following them on Twitter?

thats dreadknight garen
no, it's an NA youtube promo... seems EU aswell... OCE will forever be left out of the cool promos.{{item:3070}}
